attributes.action: Justice served for women that abuse men physically,mentally and emotionally
attributes.additional_details:
To save these poor men 
From getting abused mentally and physically,
And justice to be served
attributes.background:
Make men an woman equal 
Men get arrested if they hit a women 
So why don't the women get arrested 
Disgrace

rejection.details:
Offences relating to domestic abuse apply equally to men and women.

The Government has published advice on finding out how to get help if you or someone you know is a victim of domestic abuse, which might be helpful: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/domestic-abuse-how-to-get-help

Decisions about investigating accusations of domestic abuse are a matter for the police, not the Government or House of Commons.
